title: Quest for the Enchanted Book
description: My name is Aidan Miers.Someone tried to kill my dad. I don't know why, but I have to save him. If that means I risk my life, so be it.Magic is real and I'm going to use it to save my father.Book 1 in the Aidan and the end of the World Series.Full series in orderQuest for the Enchanted BookQuest for the Fossilized FangQuest for the Spelled Brew
author: Colleen S. Myers
